author: Anonymous Calc
title: points for P4 style rules
question: Hi, just want to make sure, in this case, the point of style rules for P4, is my grade 0 or 60, I saw 60 under total grade but I also saw 0, so I'm confused.
student_answer: The autograder report does say “Ignore this autograde” next to the 0% so your mark for this part (style rules) would be 60%.
